disband.help: Disbands the current squad you are the leader of. This only works in a squad channel.

invite.help: Invites one or more mentioned users to the squad.
invite.short-help: Invites one or more mentioned users to the squad
invite.response-not-part-of-squad: You are not part of a squad. You can create one by typing `{{command_request}}`.
invite.response-invited: {mentions}, the following people have been invited: {{- members}}.
invite.response-invited-and-already-part-of-squ: {mentions}, the following people have been invited: {{- members}}. {{- failed_members}} could not be invited because they are part of a squad already
invite.response-already-part-of-squad: {mentions}, {{- members}} could not be invited because they are part of a squad already
invite.message-invited: {{- leader}} has invited {{- members}} to the squad.

kick.help: Kicks one or more mentioned users from the squad. This only works in a squad channel.
kick.short-help: Kicks one or more mentioned users from the squad

leader.help: Gets the current leader of the squad. This only works in a squad channel.
leader.short-help: Gets the current leader of the squad
leader.response-no-leader: This squad has currently no leader.
leader.response: This squad is led by {{- leader}}.

leave.help: Leaves the current squad you are in. This only works in a squad channel.
leave.response-leader: You can't leave the squad because you're the squad leader. You have to either transfer your squad leader status with `{{command_transfer}}` or disband the squad entirely with `{{command_disband}}`.

request.help: Requests a new squad channel for raiding. You can only request a new channel if you are not part of one already.
request.short-help: Requests a new squad channel for raiding
request.response-already-part-of-squad: You are part of a squad already! Please head over to {{- channel}}.
request.response: Your squad channel {{- channel}} has been created. Good luck!.
request.message-rules:
Welcome {{- leader}} to your newly created squad **{{- name}}**.

‚óΩ‚óΩ The rules are simple: ‚óΩ‚óΩ

The created text channel *{{- text_channel}}* and voice channel *{{- voice_channel}}* are made specifically for your squad. They are invisible and can only be accessed by the people you invite (except staff). These channels are also **temporary**. They will be removed once everyone leaves the voice channel or when you type `{{command_disband}}` manually. This means that **every message will be lost once the channels are deleted**.

You have **{{channel_expire}} minutes** to join the respective voice channel *{{voice_channel}}*. If you have not joined the voice channel by then, this squad will be removed automatically by yours truly. You can always create a new squad afterwards.

Only the squad leader can manage the squad with the following commands:
üîπ `{{command_invite}}` will invite one or more mentioned people (this only works in the same channel as where you created this squad).
üîπ `{{command_kick}}` will kick one or more mentioned people.
üîπ `{{command_transfer}}` will transfer squad leader status to the mentioned person.
üîπ `{{command_disband}}` will disband this squad.

Everyone else can do `{{command_leader}}` (which shows the current squad leader) and `{{command_leave}}` (which will cause you to leave the squad).

Good luck and have fun! üçª
